description:
A customized Gunpla used by the Renato brothers, based on the BuCUE from MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM SEED, which appears in the Gunpla Race during the seventh period of the World Tournament. Its crawler tracks give it good mobility even on bad roads, and it is also fully armed with missiles and combination beam guns/beam sabers attached to multi-jointed arms.
Source: Official Website
name: BuCUE Tank
